{"id":1001075596,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690040528,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1001075596/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ways to Express an Integer as Sum of Powers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<long long int>v;\n    \n    void fxn(vector<long long int>&v,int n,int &cnt,int ind,int sum){\n        if(ind>v.size()-1){\n            if(sum==0){cnt++;}\n            return ;\n        }\n        fxn(v,n,cnt,ind+1,sum-v[ind]);\n        fxn(v,n,cnt,ind+1,sum);\n    }\n    int numberOfWays(int n, int x) {\n        int i=1,t=1;\n    while(t==1){\n        long long int a=pow(i,x);\n        if(a<=n){\n            v.push_back(a);\n        }else{t=0;}\n        i++;\n    }    \n        int cnt=0;\n        fxn(v,n,cnt,0,n);\n        return cnt;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ways-to-express-an-integer-as-sum-of-powers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
